content: Anonymous speech is one of the most important aspects of free speech. As the old USSR joke goes … Comrade Ivan: Where are the tractors we were promised? Commisar: Let me get back to you on that. What’s your name? Comrade Ivan: Comrade Ivan. Later… Comrade Boris: I have a question. Commisar: You also want to know where the tractors are? Comrade Boris: No. I want to know where is Comrade Ivan? This is why we have secret ballots. Secret speech is much the same. We need to feel sure we will not be harmed for telling those with power what they don’t want us saying.
